FuncDef: This command monitors MPLS TP LSP ingress statistics.
CLIs: tsp-lsp-ingress-stats lsp <lsp-name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the LSP name up to 64 characters in length.
Specifies how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Specifies the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
